> Heh, sounds like another windows 'feature'.

*rolls eyes at Microshaft*  There's only 1 'feature' I want from 
Windows.  All the bugs from the previous version fixed without adding 
any other new 'features'.

> If you want something secured, encrypt it :)

Hmm.  The obvious question is since it appears I have the only zipped 
copy around of the last registered version of Gladiator, do I put the 
password back on that copy or not?
